title: Mystery Reward
body: I got in total 6 chest thingies 3 mystery chest and 3 mystery skins. Riot said something about getting a bonus skin ? when is that ?

replies.body:
We are supposed to receive them within a week of the event ending.

Since it ended on the 10th, you should receive it before the 18th.

Any update on the process, I read that some poeple have unlock 1 of their skin (not all) and I'm just sitting here with 0/5 of the expected skin^^

Are you sure everything will be done for 18/08?

I'm not working on the distribution directly, so I don't know the exact status of the rewards, however, [this thread](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/tXjcpYAU-act-3-questions-about-the-bilgewater-event-we-got-you-covered-reward-distribution-on-going) is being updated as rewards are completed in terms of distribution.
